class.name: SpineTimeline
class.brief_description: The base class for all timelines.
class.description: The base class for all timelines.

method.name: get_frame_count
method.description: The number of frames for this timeline.

method.name: get_frame_entries
method.description: The number of entries stored per frame.

method.name: get_frames
method.description: The time in seconds and any other values for each frame. Modifying the array has no effect.

method.name: get_property_ids
method.description: Uniquely encodes both the type of this timeline and the skeleton properties that it affects. Modifying the array has no effect.

method.name: get_type
method.description: The timeline's type encoded as a string.
